name: PAN syslog USERID with sample data

search.query:
dataset=$vt_lookups lookupFile=palo_syslog_sample_userid
| extend my_type=${syslogType}
| where my_type=="USERID"
| summarize count() by datasource 
| order by count_ desc

elements.title: Distribution of User-ID Events by Data Source

search.query:
dataset=$vt_lookups lookupFile=palo_syslog_sample_userid
| extend my_type=${syslogType}
| where my_type=="USERID"
| summarize count() by datasource_name 
| order by count_ desc

elements.title: Distribution of User-ID Events by Data Source Name

search.query:
dataset=$vt_lookups lookupFile=palo_syslog_sample_userid
| extend my_type=${syslogType}
| where my_type=="USERID"
| top 10 by _time desc
